job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgt implement and maintain the effectiveness of the data quality systemltpgtltpgt review draft protocols and provide comments on aspects of study that impact study set up data collection and transmission and workflow and implications for external client groups sponsorvendorltpgtltpgt ensure the design of clinical data collection and management systems used by the acpru in the conduct of clinical research trials accurately reflect the protocol requirements and needs of external client groups sponsorvendorltpgtltpgt aligns ds study team with program and studylevel analytics strategies for assigned studies works with data and statistical sciences dss data warehouse analyst statistical programmer and statistician to ensure the context accuracy and timeliness of clinical data collection and management systems are optimizedltpgtltpgt connects with crossfunctional teams to design work product and as an analytics consultantltpgtltpgt contributes to study execution lessons learned across functionsltpgtltpgt if assigned assist in the alignment of data management systems used by the acpru with additional trial systems eg edc irt eproltpgtltpgt liaises with dss monitors statistics or others involved to facilitate discrepancy management in clinical trials ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt bachelors degreeltpgtltpgt years in clinical researchltpgtltpgt years experience with clinical research data systemsltpgtltpgt electronic source systems experience preferredltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtlocationltstronggtltpgtltpgtonsite role at north chicago il ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtresearch analyticsclinicalltpgt
